author: The Hated One
description:
Interview with Hanna from Tuta Mail, the most secure email provider in the world. This is no sponsored, so support my work here: https://www.patreon.com/thehatedone 

Tuta Mail: https://tuta.com/

TIMESTAMPS
00:00 Intro
1:30 Who is Hannah and what is Tuta?
4:30 Hannah's privacy journey in Germany
8:00 What is Tuta doing to protect their user privacy now and in the future of quantum computing?
11:22 How would Tuta respond to an order to build a backdoor into their encryption
14:16 CHAT CONTROL is an authoritarian nightmare 
17:24 What is Tuta's business model?
21:12 Who owns and invests in Tuta?
22:04 How will Tuta sustain its business and growth in the future?
27:15 The problem with "walled gardens" and tech "ecosystems"
32:35 Why Tuta refuses AI in all their products
35:35 Tuta's ethical principles that go beyond privacy and open source
42:00 Privacy as a principle vs privacy as a product
44:53 SHE SAID I AM BRILLIANT!
45:35 How CHAT CONTROL enables elite totalitarianism
49:00 Are th
title: I talked to the makers of the MOST SECURE EMAIL in the world
